Video: Popcaan – “Love Yuh Bad”

posted by Adrienne Black on November 19, 2014 in Video

As the frigid temperatures of winter begin to kick in for some of us, it’s difficult to even remember what summer felt like. Thankfully, Popcaan has finally released the visuals for his big summer hit “Love Yuh Bad” to remind us.

Popcaan and his love interest can be seen enjoying a casual day in their secluded tropical paradise. Although they may not be doing much, doing nothing with the one you love always makes things better and this video is exact depiction of that. The simplicity of the video is what really makes it sweet. And what’s sweeter than sitting down and having your girl do your hair? Not much.

Watch the video above.
